description:
Rain shadow pants - Light enough to be an afterthought - until the downpour - our Rain Shadow Pants provide fully seam-sealed waterproof/breathable protection. They're made from packable, lightweight and tear-resistant 2.5-layer 100% nylon with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish. On the inside, a raised pattern diffuses and channels moisture away from the skin, aids in hassle-free layering, and enhances long-term durability. Features include a buttoned, zip-fly-separating waistband with partial elastic; a cleaner, more comfortable finish; anatomically contoured knees; and new fully separating side zips with snap closures at the ankle and waist. Gripper elastic cuffs.

Details:
  • 2.5-layer tear-resistant fabric with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish
  • "Highly engineered interior surface texture channels moisture away from skin, protects the waterproof barrier from abrasion and slides easily over layers"
  • "Updated, clean-finished separating waistband is partially elasticized and has a zip fly"
  • Fully separating side-zips with snap closures at the ankle and waist
  • Articulated knees
  • Elastic cuff at the ankle

description:
Simple guide pants - A staple for rock, ice and mixed climbing, spring skiing and all things mountain, our revised soft-shell Simple Guide Pants deliver in every condition. They're our lightest stretch-woven alpine pant, and the polyester (100% recycled)/spandex double-weave blend stretches with your every stride, stays durable, moves sweat, breathes, and resists weather. Updated styling includes straight lower legs, a zippered fly and a partially elasticized waistband. Other features include articulated knees and a gusseted crotch to help you stay limber, and DWR (durable water repellent) treated reverse-coil zippers on the pockets: two front, one thigh and one rear hip. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

description:
Single shot - The Single Shot organizes your daily necessities with its thoughtful, efficient design. A simple flap with hook-and-loop closure accesses a main compartment that has a zippered mesh pocket; two organizer pockets (one with an internal security pocket) keep smaller gear at your fingertips. An easy-access document sleeve holds airline tickets, reading material or a notebook. The long, adjustable shoulder strap and top-mounted carry handle make the bag both comfortable and convenient to haul. Made from 150-denier all-recycled polyester double weave with a polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish.

description:
Watermaster waders - king - Blackberries, barbwire, basalt...the fact is, we ask a lot of our waders - most importantly, that they keep us dry through all sorts of abuse. The new version of our Watermaster Waders accomplishes this on a number of fronts: First, our proprietary waterproof/breathable polyester microfiber fabric package with H2No Hydrostorm barrier is quantitatively more puncture resistant than the competition. Then, because wet is wet, whether it comes from inside or out, we use lighter, more breathable fabric up top and a tougher version below. Finally, and not to be overlooked, our innovative internal suspension system makes it easier than ever to, uh...relieve yourself without taking off jacket or vest. Something to consider in a driving rainstorm. It all adds up to an incredibly dry, durable and lightweight pair of waders. In other words, Watermasters. Field repair kit included.

Details:
  • Polyester microfiber shell with a proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish; Inside zippered main pocket (with piggyback mesh pocket and internal key/tool loop) flips out for quick access
  • "Unique, waist-mounted suspender allows easy conversion from chest to waist height; TPU post and slot design on front and back of suspenders offers security when wading deep and for roll down, waist high comfort"
  • Anatomically curved knees and modified Y-Joint crotch; inside leg seams are positioned away from wear zones
  • "Specifically designed left and right legs and booties; built-in, heavyweight reinforcement fabric gravel guards with abrasion resistance scuff zones"
  • "1 1/4"" gripper elastic gravel guard cuffs; concealed stainless steel, locking boot hooks secure cuff to boot and avoid line catch"
  • Stretch Wading Belt with a quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle provides smooth function and an easy adjustable fit
  • Field repair kit included


Fabric: "Upper: 3-layer, 5.2-oz polyester microfiber twill shell with a proprietary waterproof/ breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge® DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Lower torso and legs: 3-layer, 7-oz polyester microfiber reinforcement fabric with proprietary H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Gravel guards: 6.35-oz polyester microfiber with Deluge DWR finish. Booties: 3-mm neoprene with abrasion-resistant fabric soles"

Weight: (1096 g 38 oz)

Made in China.

description:
Cap 2 cap sleeve - The fastest-drying of our performance baselayer fabrics, Capilene 2 has an open knit that invites airflow to keep you cool and provides excellent wicking and exceptional breathability to keep you dry. It's also insulative enough for chilly days when winter hasn't quite released its grip. This minimalist tech top features a feminine V-neck with a self-fabric neckline, and easy-moving underarm panels that provide shaping. Raglan-style sleeves stay out of the way of pack straps to eliminate chafe. Made of 4-oz 100% polyester (54% recycled) with Gladiodor natural odor control for the garment. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

  • "Fastest-drying of our Capilene fabrics, it is insulates enough for use on chilly days and can be worn beneath other layers"
  • "V-neck helps ventilate, self-fabric neckline is soft next to skin"
  • Raglan sleeves and underarm panels merge out of the way of pack straps
  • Cap sleeve provides unrestricted movement with optimal sun coverage and flattering fit

description:
Cap 2 t-shirt - Like a sweet breeze for long runs and hot days, Capilene 2 features an open knit that invites airflow to keep you cool and provides excellent wicking and exceptional breathability to keep you dry. Also insulative enough for chilly days when winter hasn't quite released its grip, it's the fastest-drying of our performance baselayer fabrics. With a feminine neck and elbow-length sleeves that stay put. Raglan-style sleeves and flat-ribbed underarm panels merge out of the way of straps to eliminate chafe. Made from 4-oz 100% polyester (54% recycled) with Gladiodor natural odor control for the garment. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • Fabric has an open knit that invites airflow and provides excellent wicking for endurance activities in warm to moderate temperatures
  • "Fastest-drying of our Capilene fabrics, it insulates enough for use on chilly days and can be worn beneath other layers"
  • Self-fabric neckline soft against skin
  • Raglan sleeves and underarm panels merge out of the way of pack straps
  • Longer sleeve hits just above the elbow providing more protection and a flattering fit
  • "Flat-rib panel-piecing under the arms and sides is exceptionally breathable, fast drying and eliminates armpit seam chafing"


Fabric: 4-oz 100% polyester (54% recycled) with Gladiodor natural odor control for the garment. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: 110 g (3.9 oz)

Made in Mexico.

description:
S/s sol patrol shirt - In theory, chasing Indonesian surf and bonefish for weeks on end is like going to heaven; in practice, it's really damn hot. To make sure you're covered, we've travel-tested the Short-Sleeved Sol Patrol Shirt for function-forward UV protection in sweltering spots the world over. The 2.4-oz 100% polyester ripstop fabric and side air vents are receptive to any breeze providing comfort and hardcore 30-UPF sun protection in a wide array of circumstances. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • "Lightweight, quick-drying polyester"
  • Provides 30-UPF sun protection
  • Double-layer collar converts to stand-up collar for extra sun protection
  • Collar stays put and crisp thanks to hidden snaps at collar points
  • Cooling mesh center back vent and side-arm vents facilitate flow-through ventilation
  • Mesh-lined button-through chest pockets; inset zippered pocket at right


Fabric: 2.4-oz 100% polyester ripstop with 30-UPF sun protection. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

description:
Nine trails vest - Simplicity in action - this vest protects the core, moves, breathes, and weighs nearly nothing. The lightweight, wind-resistant 15-denier 100% nylon is treated with a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish to shed light rain, and the exceptionally breathable stretch-woven back panel (91% all-recycled polyester/9% spandex) vents excess heat. The high-rise tricot-lined neck provides a tight seal; the armholes and hem now have elastic binding. Reflective heat-transfer logos (front and back) and a reflective center-back zippered pocket keep you visible.

Details:
  • "Light, slightly transparent, tough, triple-ripstop nylon soft shell on torso and shoulders; breathable recycled polyester stretch-woven fabric on back; vest is treated with a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish for weather protection"
  • Elastic binding at armholes and hem for a good fit
  • Center-back reflective zippered pocket
  • Reflective heat-transfer logos (front and back)
  • Can be worn over baselayers and light midlayers


Fabric: Body: 1.1-oz 15-denier 100% nylon with 50-denier triple-ripstop yarns. Back panel: 3.5-oz 75-denier stretch woven 91% all-recycled polyester/9% spandex. Vest has Deluge DWR finish

Weight: (89 g 3.1 oz)

Made in Vietnam.

description:
Watermaster waders - reg - Blackberries, barbwire, basalt...the fact is, we ask a lot of our waders - most importantly, that they keep us dry through all sorts of abuse. The new version of our Watermaster Waders accomplishes this on a number of fronts: First, our proprietary waterproof/breathable polyester microfiber fabric package with H2No Hydrostorm barrier is quantitatively more puncture resistant than the competition. Then, because wet is wet, whether it comes from inside or out, we use lighter, more breathable fabric up top and a tougher version below. Finally, and not to be overlooked, our innovative internal suspension system makes it easier than ever to, uh...relieve yourself without taking off jacket or vest. Something to consider in a driving rainstorm. It all adds up to an incredibly dry, durable and lightweight pair of waders. In other words, Watermasters. Field repair kit included.

Details:
  • Polyester microfiber shell with a proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish; Inside zippered main pocket (with piggyback mesh pocket and internal key/tool loop) flips out for quick access
  • "Unique, waist-mounted suspender allows easy conversion from chest to waist height; TPU post and slot design on front and back of suspenders offers security when wading deep and for roll down, waist high comfort"
  • Anatomically curved knees and modified Y-Joint crotch; inside leg seams are positioned away from wear zones
  • "Specifically designed left and right legs and booties; built-in, heavyweight reinforcement fabric gravel guards with abrasion resistance scuff zones"
  • "1 1/4"" gripper elastic gravel guard cuffs; concealed stainless steel, locking boot hooks secure cuff to boot and avoid line catch"
  • Stretch Wading Belt with a quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle provides smooth function and an easy adjustable fit
  • Field repair kit included


Fabric: "Upper: 3-layer, 5.2-oz polyester microfiber twill shell with a proprietary waterproof/ breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge® DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Lower torso and legs: 3-layer, 7-oz polyester microfiber reinforcement fabric with proprietary H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Gravel guards: 6.35-oz polyester microfiber with Deluge DWR finish. Booties: 3-mm neoprene with abrasion-resistant fabric soles"

Weight: (1096 g 38 oz)

Made in China.

description:
Pack vest - Everyone knows the best spots are beyond where crowds are willing to go - the Pack Vest helps you get there with everything you need. This award-winning modular design combines a cool-wearing mesh vest with a fishing-specific, multiuse daypack; a detachable harness allows vest and pack to be used separately. The vest is cut short for deep wading and has a rod holder, accessory D-rings, piggyback tool pockets and reach-across zippered pockets. It also connects to the Stormfront Pack harness. The pack features a floating baffle internal divider, large external mesh pocket with drainholes, water-resistant zippers, breathable 3-D spacer mesh back panel and shoulder straps, built in rod-tube holder and a mesh water-bottle pocket. Vest pockets are now made from 100% nylon, while the pack is built with tough polyester (47% recycled) double-weave fabric. Vest sternum strap and pack compression buckles have been upgraded to low-profile Duraflex Stealth-V buckles for smoother function and easier adjustment.

Details:
  • "Polyester mesh vest and 300-denier polyester double-weave pack work together or separately; comes with detachable, adjustable harness for use without pack; vest will also connect to the Stormfront Pack harness"
  • "Vertical pocket configuration, front pockets have reach-across, zippered access, separate piggyback tool pocket, drain holes; inverted hemostat pocket, accessory D-rings, rod holder, foam fly patch, two glasses loops"
  • "Vest sternum strap buckle has been upgraded to the adjustable and quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle for smoother function, lower profile and easy adjustment; cut short for deep wading"
  • "Pack: 3-D spacer-mesh pads the ergonomic back panel and anatomically curved shoulder strap; Two main compartments with DWR (durable water repellent) coated, water resistant zippers, divided by floating baffle, outside mesh pocket with three grommet drainholes, small top pocket, mesh water bottle pocket"
  • "Front compression strap buckles have been upgraded to the adjustable and quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle for smoother function, lower profile and easy adjustment; two compression straps, two lash points for securing a rod-tube"
  • Pack panel sleeve for hydration reservoir
  • Patent number 5639005


Fabric: "Vest: 4.6-oz 100% polyester mesh. Pockets: 4.3 oz 100% nylon. Pack: 300-denier 100% polyester (47% recycled) double weave with polyurethane coating. Lining: 200-denier polyester with polyurethane coating. Straps/Back panel: polyester 3D spacer mesh. Vest, pockets, lining and pack all have DWR finish"

Weight: (1021 g 35.4 oz)

Made in Vietnam.

description:
Stand up shorts-5 in. - They've been around for 30-plus years, re-envisioned, reincarnated, tweaked over, tinkered with and constantly improved. Yet the more we change them, the more they stay the same. Stand-Up Shorts are made from rugged 10-oz 100% organic cotton to thwart climbing's abusive tendencies. The hardworking canvas softens and personalizes with age. Doubled fabric in the seat increases durability and forms two rear pockets; a set-in pocket holds a wallet. Inseam (size 32) is 5". Garment-washed for softness and minimal shrinkage. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • Durable organic cotton canvas will soften and personalize with age; double seat for abrasion resistance in rough terrain
  • Zip fly with button closure
  • Quarter-top front pockets; hook-and-loop back pockets; separate inset hook-and-loop security pocket


Fabric: 10-oz 100% organic cotton canvas. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: (409 g 14.2 oz)

Made in Thailand.

description:
Sticks 'n stones morocco poster - Patagonia Rock Ambassador Brittany Griffith and Jonathan Thesenga on the approach to Tout Pour Le Club (IV 5.12d). High Atlas Mountains, Morocco. For 30 years we've paid tribute to human adventures both near and far with a collection of photographs that speak to the passion, joy and beauty of lives spent outside. These photos have appeared exclusively on our Web site, in our catalog and on the walls of our retail stores and specialty outdoor clothiers around the world. And now we are excited to make select photos available to you as posters. We hope they brighten up your space and inspire you to get outside.

  • "Photo by Andrew Burr ?2009 Patagonia, Inc."

description:
Quiet please t-shirt - Thoreau said that "silence is the universal refuge" a sentiment made clear with the Quiet Please T-Shirt. Illustrated by the art team Heads of State, the tee has an inside message about Snowlands Network(SaveOurSnowlands.org), a group leading the charge to keep our winter wild lands serene preserving and protecting them for low-impact users. The shirt is recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • Ringspun yarns for a softer hand
  • Taped shoulder seams
  • Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free


Fabric: 5.4-oz 100% organic cotton. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: (175 g 6.1 oz)

Made in USA.

description:
R1 full-zip jkt - It stretches, breathes, wicks, and warms - no wonder so many serious trail and mountain athletes use and abuse our R1. And the full-zip front makes it even more versatile, from a midlayer in winter to a lightweight jacket on early spring mornings and alpine summer evenings. The high/low interior grid polyester enhances compressibility, airflow, insulation and dry time, and the jersey microfiber face allows smooth layering. Two zippered handwarmer pockets sit above the harness line and have glued-in (no seams) internal mesh pocket bags. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • "Versatile R1 fleece provides excellent stretch, warmth, wicking and breathability in a variety of temperatures"
  • "High/low interior grid-structure enhances compressibility, airflow and dry time"
  • Jersey microfiber face allows nonbinding layering
  • Center-front zipper
  • Handwarmer pockets


Fabric: R1: 6.5-oz Polartec Power Dry 93% polyester (60% recycled)/7% spandex. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: 357 g (12.6 oz)

Made in Colombia.

description:
Lw guide pants - A backcountry version of our immensely popular Simple Guides, the Lightweight Guide Pants combine skiing and alpine climbing features with a lightweight, free-moving and highly breathable 4-way stretch-woven fabric. They resist moisture and provide mountain-worthy durability, and the fit allows for spring-weight underlayers on those brisk alpine starts. Reinforced, articulated knees enhance mobility, while the zippered and gusseted cuffs adjust to various boot girths, have a snap closure, and feature tie-down loops as well as crampon/ski edge scuff guards. With a zippered fly, belt loops and pockets (two hand, one glued-on right thigh) that close with laser-cut, glued-in zippers. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • Lightweight 4-way stretch-woven polyester double weave with DWR (durable water repellent) finish; separated zip waist (not pull-on)
  • Belt loops; partial elasticized waistband
  • "Zip fly; pockets: two zippered hand, one zippered thigh, right glued-on thigh"
  • Hand and thigh zips are laser-cut and glued; reinforced knees to resist abrasion
  • Articulated knees; crampon/ski-edge scuff guard
  • Zippered and snap gusset with full gripper elastic
  • Tie-down loops at ankle cuffs


Fabric: 6.2-oz 91% all-recycled polyester/9% spandex double weave with Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: 405 g (14.3 oz)

Made in Thailand.

description:
Lw r4 jkt - High off the deck on Warbonnet Peak in the immaculate Wind River Mountains, the naming of the range quickly makes sense. Our windproof and stretchy Lightweight R4 Jacket protects and warms with a Polartec Windbloc laminate sandwiched between a low-nap polyester microfleece face and a high/low grid polyester interior. Unlaminated R1 underarm panels (60% recycled polyester) enhance breathability and mobility, while a neck gasket seals out the elements. Seamless shoulders allow pack-wearing comfort. With three external pockets (the handwarmers stay clear of your harness), one internal drop-in pocket and a drawcord hem. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • "Lightweight, durable low-nap microfleece face"
  • Full-stretch Polartec Windbloc laminate
  • R1 interior-grid construction speeds wicking
  • Nonlaminated R1 fabric under the arms enhances mobility and breathability
  • Drawcord collar with Supplex stand; protective chin flap for comfort; seamless shoulders for comfort under a pack
  • "Pockets: two handwarmers, one chest and two internal drop-in"
  • Drawcord hem


Fabric: Lightweight R4 shell: 8-oz Polartec Windbloc 100% polyester microfleece laminated to R1 Polartec Power Dry polyester. R1 panels: 6.5-oz Polartec Power Dry 93% polyester (60% recycled)/7% spandex. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: 467 g (16.5 oz)

Made in Colombia.

description:
R2 jkt - A modern mountain staple, the adaptable R2 Jacket serves as a stand-alone outer layer when you're on the go or as a superb insulating layer under a shell. The stretchy polyester knit uses variable-length fibers to optimize insulation and compressibility while affording outstanding breathability, warmth, moisture-management and minimal weight. Stretchy R1 fabric (made with 60% recycled polyester) inside the collar and cuffs enhances skin comfort, and the pliable R2 body fabric means you'll move easily. With an easy-to-use front zipper, glued-in zippered pockets (one chest and two handwarmers) and forward-set shoulder seams for pack-wearing comfort. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • "Highly technical R2 fabric is light, stretchy and compressible, with great breathability"
  • "Insulating long fibers alternate with dense, supportive short fibers to optimize insulation and reduce bulk"
  • Directional knit wicks moisture and speeds dry time
  • Inner collar lined with R1 fabric (made with recycled polyester) for next-to-skin comfort; collar and protective chin flap lined with R1 fabric (made with recycled polyester) for next-to-skin comfort
  • Low-bulk R1 fabric cuffs
  • Pockets: one chest and zippered handwarmers; zippers all welded and reinforced with Supplex for snag-free operation
  • Shoulder seams set forward for pack-wearing comfort


Fabric: R2 shell: 7.4-oz Polartec Thermal Pro 100% polyester (40% recycled) fleece. R1 panels: 6.5-oz Polartec Power Dry 93% polyester (60% recycled)/7% spandex. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: 419 g (14.8 oz)

Made in Colombia.

description:
Rain shadow jkt - Staying inside isn't the only way to stay dry - enjoy the trails in all conditions with fully seam-sealed waterproof/breathable protection. The Rain Shadow is made from a packable, lightweight and tear-resistant 2.5-layer 100% nylon fabric with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish. On the inside, a raised pattern diffuses and channels moisture away from skin, aids in hassle-free layering, and enhances long-term durability. Updated with microfleece lining on the neck and chin, waterproof handwarmer pockets (no longer mesh-lined) with zipper garages, and external zippers that are now water-resistant (without storm flaps). Also features a roll-down, 2-way-adjustable, helmet-compatible hood, a 2-way center-front zipper, self-fabric cuff tabs and a drawcord hem.

Details:
  • "2.5-layer tear-resistant fabric with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish; highly engineered interior surface texture channels moisture away from skin, protects the waterproof barrier from abrasion and slides easily over layers"
  • "Roll-down, 2-way-adjustable hood with a laminated visor for improved hood structure and visibility in poor conditions"
  • Microfleece-lined neck and chin for comfort and enhanced protection of barrier
  • "All exterior zippers (center front, handwarmer pockets and pit zips) have a water-resistant coating to keep you dry without extra storm flaps and hook-and-loop closures"
  • Waterproof handwarmer pockets - without mesh lining
  • Updated custom zipper pulls
  • "Low-profile, laminated self-fabric cuff tabs; drawcord hem"


Fabric: "2.5-layer, 2.5-oz 100% nylon with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and Deluge DWR finish"

Weight: (331 g 11.5 oz)

Made in Vietnam.

description:
Lw everyday socks - An essential part of the daily grind, these exceptionally soft, wearable socks have an inviting mix of 55% organic cotton/40% stretch nylon/5% spandex for moisture-wicking next-to-skin comfort. An open grid over the top of the foot and a looped Lintoe construction combine to create excellent airflow for breathability and kick-your-feet-up foot comfort. The jersey-knit cuff extends to mid-calf; height is 9.5".

Details:
  • Organic cotton and nylon blend is ideal for everyday use
  • "Fabric content and strategic knit balance moisture wicking, cushioning, durability and comfort"
  • An open grid over top of foot allows excellent airflow and breathability
  • Looped Lintoe construction creates the smallest and flattest seam possible for ultimate toe comfort


Fabric: 55% organic cotton/40% nylon/5% spandex

Weight: (49 g 1.7 oz)

Made in USA.

Lw hiking crew liner socks - Liners take the brunt of our rambles. They add lightweight warmth in cold conditions, reduce chafing when paired with a sock, and keep feet dry and cool when worn solo in sweltering weather. description:
Storm light jkt - An emerging classic, inspired by the original Storm Jacket and holding true to timeless traits: It's waterproof, breathable and comfortable. Built for warm-weather use and engineered to be recycled at the end of its days, the Storm Light keeps you dry and in motion - from lowland treks to high-mountain passes. Full waterproof/breathable protection combines with a hanging mesh and taffeta liner for a soft, pliable, comfortable feel. Storm flaps cover the pit zips, the three external zippered pockets and the center-front 2-way zipper. Other details include a soft chamois chin guard, a 2-way-adjustable hood that rolls down into the microfleece-lined collar, an internal drop-in pocket and a drawcord hem. Cuffs secure with self-fabric tabs. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling.

Details:
  • 2-layer polyester fabric with waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and a hanging mesh-and-taffeta liner for greater comfort
  • 2-way-adjustable and stowable hood
  • Soft chamois chin guard
  • "Storm flaps on center-front zipper, pit zips, and external pocket zippers"
  • "Pockets: one external left chest, two handwarmers, one internal drop-in"
  • Cuffs secure with self-fabric tab
  • Drawcord hem


Fabric: "Shell: 2-layer, 75-denier 3.8-oz 100% polyester laminate with a waterproof/ breathable H2No barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Shell lining: 2.9-oz 100% all-recycled polyester mesh. Hood lining: 2.3-oz 50-denier 100% all-recycled polyester taffeta. Collar lining and chin flap: 5.5-oz 100% polyester brushed-jersey. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program"

Weight: (689 g 23.9 oz)

Made in China.

description:
Stretch ascent jkt - Simple, stretchy, lightweight and waterproof. Made for alpine climbs where the realities include sideways-blowing sleet, our Stretch Ascent Jacket provides full stormproof protection and extraordinary breathability. The stretch-woven polyester (100% recycled) and waterproof/breathable barrier combine in a pliable 2.5-layer fabric package that enables your most limber moves. The roll-down, helmet-compatible hood adjusts in three ways with an easy-to-use single-pull system. A water-resistant, coated center-front zipper remains easy to open and close, the water-resistant external pocket zippers have zipper garages, and the third pocket is an internal drop-in. Cuffs secure with self-fabric tabs, and the hem's drawcord routes through the pockets. The hood's structured visor improves visibility in poor conditions. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • "H2No waterproof/breathable, 2.5-layer stretch-woven shell"
  • "Helmet compatible, roll-down, single-pull 3-way adjustable hood with laminated visor"
  • Front zipper offers extreme water resistance and easy zipping
  • "Pockets: two PU-zippered handwarmers with zipper garages, one internal drop-in"
  • Cuffs secure with self-fabric hook-and-loop cuff closures
  • Hem drawcord routed through pockets


Fabric: "2.5-layer, 50-denier 4.1-oz 100% all-recycled stretch-woven polyester with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program"

Weight: 476 g (16.8 oz)

Made in Vietnam.

For simultaneous air conditioning and tough 30-UPF sun protection, the super-breathable, fast drying Sun Hoody is made of lightweight polyester jersey. description:
Lw travel courier - This graceful rendition of the courier bag is sleek and nearly weightless. It has a zippered closure with adjustable drawstring, and a zippered security pocket for your bike light or prayer beads. Its breathable, adjustable shoulder strap is comfortable and quick-drying. When not in use, the bag stuffs into its own pocket for easy stowing. Made with strong yet extremely lightweight 50-denier triple-ripstop nylon with a polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Bottom reinforcement is 150-denier polyester (47% recycled) double-weave ShiftLayer.

Details:
  • Main compartment accessed through top by zippered closure with adjustable drawstring
  • Zippered security pocket and key clip
  • Bag stuffs into its own pocket when not in use
  • "Breathable shoulder strap is ultralight, quick-drying and adjustable"
  • Extremely lightweight triple-ripstop fabric affords excellent tear resistance

description:

description:
Marlwalker - Stalking the coral flats can be tough on feet and even tougher on emotions. Fortunately, our classic flats shoe provides the comfort, support and protection - at least for feet - every flats angler will appreciate. Light, flexible (with notched flex zones to allow for more natural foot movement) and fast drying, the Marlwalker is known for killer durability that's made it the favorite of flats guides everywhere. Boot-style protection and support reduce fatigue and maximize stability. The upper is made of tough, quick-drying synthetic leather and ultra-high-filtration hydrophobic polyester mesh (100% recycled). More features: hidden lace eyelets, padded neoprene/spandex tongue, cushioned heel, cushioned wraparound ankle support, a sturdy toe cap and nonmarking rubber sole, neoprene collar, and wide last.

description:
Houdini full-zip jkt - Now you see it, now you don't. Just like the sun on blustery days, our ultralight, ultrapackable Houdini can shed fickle weather and then disappear when the skies clear. The textured triple-ripstop nylon fabric proves surprisingly tough, while the Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish wards off flurries six pitches from the deck. description:
Baggies shorts - Summertime unwinds in a boisterous flurry of kids, dogs, sunshine and water. Our do-all, go-all Baggies Shorts flow effortlessly from chaos to quiet times with an easy-going feel. description:
Microburst jkt - From the Scottish Highlands to the Torres del Paine, trekking some of the most beautiful places on earth invariably means wet weather. Our Microburst hard shell offers full waterproof/breathable protection in a pared-down but durable 3-layer package (3.9-oz 100% all-recycled polyester) with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish. The 3-way-adjustable hood has a laminated brim, and a low-bulk double flap protects the 2-way center-front zipper. Low-profile self-fabric tabs close the cuffs, and a drawcord adjusts the hem. Pocketing: two exterior handwarmers and a generous interior drop-in mesh that's big enough for a map - just in case the rain is so thick you're walking in circles. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • 100% recycled and recyclable polyester face fabric with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish
  • 3-layer construction adds durability and moves interior moisture for improved performance in full-on conditions
  • Laminated brim with 3-way-adjustable hood improves function and fit
  • 2-way center-front zipper protected by a double flap with a rain gutter for storm-worthy protection
  • Pockets: two handwarmers; one generous interior drop-in mesh
  • "Low-profile, laminated, self-fabric cuff tabs"

description:
Riverwalker - sticky - High water. Slick bedrock. Cobbles like greased bowling balls. Our Riverwalkers built their reputation in the most demanding wading conditions, with great flexibility, fast drying times and light weight. Notched flex zones allow for natural foot movement; a polypropylene insole/shank provides stability. But don't let the comfort fool you: These are tough boots for serious wading. Details: synthetic leather and high-filtration polyester mesh (100% recycled) uppers for maximum support, protected lacing, molded EVA midsole; our Rockstopper insole/shank stabilizes grip and protects against stone-bruising. Extra comfort thanks to the padded insole and ankle support; extra durability from the highly abrasion-resistant toe bumper with stout, reinforced toebox and heel counter. In three resoleable choices: felt (sewn on), tungsten-carbide studded and sticky rubber. Sized to accommodate neoprene stocking-foot waders.

Details:
  • "Quick-drying synthetic leather for a comfortable, lightweight wading shoe; high-filtration mesh keeps out sand and silt, and drains quickly"
  • "Compression molded EVA midsole and polypropylene insole/shank combination provide torsional rigidity, support, protection from stone bruising, padded insole provides comfort and arch support; wide last accommodates a neoprene foot wader or Insulator Socks"
  • "Padded ankle support, covered, protected lacing loops with speed lace hooks at the top"
  • "Notched, sculpted flex zones for improved flexibility"
  • "Highly abrasion resistant toe bumper with stout, reinforced toebox and heel counter, sole designed to hold fin straps"
  • Sticky-Rubber Star Tread Patterned Sole provides excellent multi-directional traction without marring stream rocks
  • All outsoles can be resoled

description:
Freewheeler max - Like a storage locker on wheels, the cavernous Freightliner Max holds everything you need for an extended trip, a fishing pilgrimage or a skiing getaway. Its main compartment swallows all your clothing and holds sundries in an interior mesh pocket; shoes and gear get their own zippered end section. The Max's light-colored lining makes contents easy to find. A retractable 2-position handle nimbly steers the load, which rolls smoothly on sturdy 80-mm wheels that provide plenty of clearance; impact-resistant skidplates withstand bumps and scrapes. With haul handles at both ends, external compression straps to cinch the load and/or attach bulky items, and batten supports on the sides that keep the bag standing upright but collapse for easy storage. Made from tough 1,200-denier polyester (100% recycled) that has a polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish; with a molded foam and ballistics nylon bottom.

Details:
  • Main compartment holds load; zippered end compartment holds shoes and quick-access items
  • Interior mesh pocket holds toiletries; light-colored lining makes contents easy to find
  • Smooth-rolling 80-mm wheels provide plenty of clearance; impact-resistant skidplates
  • Molded bottom pan resists abrasion and protects contents; 2-position retractable handle makes steering easy
  • Haul handles at either end; external compression straps
  • Stowable business card holder lets you ID your bag
  • Batten supports on sides keep bag standing and collapse for easy storage


Fabric: 11-oz 1200-denier 100% all-recycled polyester. Lining: 3.3-oz 200-denier 100% polyester. Both with polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Bottom: Molded foam and ballistics cloth

description:
Torrentshell pants - Torrentshells open up the world of storm clouds, downpours and puddle jumping. Tough yet lightweight, these rain-shell pants feature a 2.5-layer, 2.6-oz 50-denier 100% nylon ripstop fabric, with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier to stop rain and a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish to resist additional moisture. Fully sealed seams provide complete protection. A full elasticized waistband simplifies the ons and offs of layering, and an internal drawcord secures the fit. The knees have articulation for easy mobility, and elastic at the hem seals out water and cold. Webbing loops inside the cuffs allow a cord to be threaded through to keep pant legs from riding up. Reflective tape follows the side seams.

Details:
  • Lightweight and durable 2-layer shell
  • "Full elasticized waistband for easy on/off and layering, with internal drawcord to secure fit"
  • Articulated knees
  • Elasticized cuff at hem to keep cold and wet out
  • Internal loops inside hem gives option to add cord to keep pants from riding up
  • Reflective tape on outer side seams


Fabric: "2.5-layer, 2.6-oz 50-denier 100% nylon ripstop with a waterproof/breathable H2No barrier and a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish"

Weight: (173 g 6 oz)

Made in China.

description:
Trim brim hat - It's hard to improve on the halcyon days of summer. The Kids' Trim Brim Hat lets kids bask comfortably in the sun - it is lightweight and scrunchable, and allows cool airflow to whisk away heat. Made of lightweight 4-ply, 4.2-oz Supplex nylon with a quick-drying DWR (durable water repellent) finish, this floppy sun hat features a circular brim that provides constant shade; it also retains its shape when wet. With an adjustable cinch cord on the crown, and a nonchafing chin strap with a soft-lock adjustment that secures the hat for shredding and tucks away when not in use. Packs small; easy care.

Details:
  • "Lightweight Supplex nylon is soft, dries fast and packs small; easy care"
  • Custom adjustment cinch on crown and non-chafing chin strap with soft-lock adjustment secures for surfing and tucks away when not in use
  • Circular brim protects ears and neck; ventilation holes; reinforced front brim retains shape when wet


Fabric: "4-ply, 4.2-oz Supplex® nylon with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish"

Weight: (72 g 2.5 oz)

Made in China.

description:
Gi ii zip-off pants - The multitalented Gi II Zip-Off Pants are made to engage the varied conditions of trekking, climbing and river running with aplomb. Made from a soft but tough Supplex nylon twill that's lightweight, quick to dry, compressible, and provides 40-UPF sun protection. They convert from pants to shorts easily without removing your footwear, and the zippers are colored coded to make re-attaching the legs a breeze. Gi II's also feature a gusseted crotch for extended leg movement, and the elastic waist has a separating low profile buckle and button-through zip fly. Two self-draining front pockets, a rear zip pocket and a beer-bottle-sized thigh pocket with zipper closure provide ample storage space for trail supplies. Pants inseam, size M, is 32"; shorts inseam, 10". Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • Updated fit
  • "Durable, quick-drying nylon twill; fixed web belt with elasticized waist, separating buckle and button-through zip fly"
  • Change safe on-seam front pockets with polyester mesh for drainage
  • Zippered side-pocket on right leg; zippered back pocket
  • Gusseted crotch
  • Zip-off legs convert pants to shorts
  • "Pants inseam is 32"" inseam; shorts inseam is 10"""


Fabric: 3.7-oz 100% Supplex nylon twill with 40-UPF sun protection. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

Weight: (375 g 13 oz)

Made in Colombia.

description:
Mlc - The secret to slipping through O'Hare's gauntlet of nerves and angst relies on your ability to move freely. Our much-loved MLC (Maximum Legal Carry-on) holds three to five days' worth of clothes, yet meets airline carry-on size requirements so you can get in and out as fast as possible. Hidden ergonomic shoulder straps quickly convert this soft-sided suitcase to a backpack for the carry-on traveler who hits the ground running and doesn't stop; with two handles for carrying like a briefcase. External zippered pockets provide easy access to travel docs and vital gear. An internal floating divider inside the main compartment separates clean from dirty. Made from 1,200-denier polyester (100% recycled) with a polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish.

Details:
  • "Main compartment opens like a book for easy packing, access and organization; compression pocket secures contents"
  • A secondary zippered sleeve pocket separates dirty clothes or shoes
  • "Padded back panel holds shoulder straps, protects your back; a separate padded pocket stores a laptop or works well as a clothing organizer"
  • "Easy-access pockets for tickets, passport, and office supplies"
  • Three carrying options: Backpack: ergonomic shoulder straps tuck neatly into a zippered compartment; Shoulder bag: comfortable split-shoulder strap for over-the-shoulder carry slides over carry handle when not in use; Briefcase: Two carry handles


Fabric: 11-oz 1200-denier 100% all-recycled polyester. Lining: 3.3-oz 200-denier 100% polyester. Both with polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish

Weight: (1341 g 46.5 oz)

Made in Philippines.

description:
Mlc burrito - Ever show up at a confab looking like you spent the night on a Yosemite ledge? Our MLC Burrito is designed to hold your clothing wrinkle-free on hangers and reduce your packing and unpacking time. This convenient carry-on garment bag can be folded in thirds (like a burrito), and hung in the closet of an airplane or placed in the overhead bin. The strong internal hanging-bar-and-hook system holds eight hangers, and hooks to the top of a door or closet rod once you've arrived. Inside, four sleeve pockets keep your personal items and toiletries organized and handy. A large mesh pocket separates your shoes from your clothing. You can carry the Burrito as a briefcase or sling it over a shoulder with the soft, adjustable shoulder strap. Made with a 1,200-denier polyester (100% recycled) exterior and a 200-denier polyester liner; both have a polyurethane coating and DWR (durable water repellent) finish.

Details:
  • "Sturdy hanging bar and hanger-hook system holds 8 hangers, and hooks to the top of a door or closet rod"
  • 4 sleeve pockets and 1 large mesh pocket hold shoes and toiletries
  • Carry with an adjustable soft shoulder strap or briefcase handle


Fabric: 11-oz 1200-denier 100% all-recycled polyester. Lining: 3.3-oz 200-denier 100% polyester. Both with polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish

Weight: (1171 g 40.6 oz)

Made in Philippines.

description:
Lightwire - Sometimes you need to leave the office in the rearview mirror. The Lightwire has plenty of room for a jacket and lunch in addition to its fully padded computer sleeve, which protects a 15" to 17" PC laptop. The dedicated flat storage section holds files and magazines, and an external pocket offers one-handed access to an office organizer. Highly breathable 3-D spacer-mesh shoulder straps and padded back panel wick away moisture. Other features include: an MP3 pocket, sternum strap with built-in safety whistle, a tuck-away waistbelt, stretch water-bottle pocket and an easy-access external security pocket. Made from 150-denier all-recycled polyester double weave with a polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish.

Details:
  • "Main compartment for clothing, files or hiking essentials"
  • Quick-access face pocket for small electronic devices and office supplies
  • Padded back panel pocket for laptop or paperwork
  • "Two mesh pockets for water, food, gloves, hats, etc"
  • 3-D spacer mesh back panel and shoulder straps; adjustable sternum strap with built-in safety whistle
  • "Holds a 15"" - 17"" laptop"


Fabric: 7.4-oz 150-denier 100% all-recycled polyester double weave. Lining: 3.3-oz 200-denier 100% polyester. Both with polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Shoulder straps: 100% polyester 3-D spacer mesh

description:
Lightwire brief - This adventure briefcase holds your bouldering gear or trail-running kit, along with the everyday implements of work and school. It even carries enough for an overnight getaway. Made with all-recycled polyester, it features a padded and suspended computer sleeve that cradles a 15" to 17" laptop against hard drops. A zippered external pocket allows one-handed access to a portable office organizer. There are also pockets for a cell phone and airline tickets, water bottle and valuables, plus a pocket for an MP3 player with an exit hole for earphones. A fully padded bottom protects contents and provides a stable base for stand-up performance. The split shoulder strap slides over the carry handle when not in use. Made from 150-denier all-recycled polyester double weave with a polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish.

Details:
  • "Front zippered pocket gives one-handed access to office pocket organizer; middle zippered compartment, with large volume, has zippered see-through pocket for passport and electronics"

  • MP3 pocket with exit hole for earphones

  • Zippered external security pocket

description:
Guide jkt - Sharp granite, sticky verglas, untracked lines - enjoy them all in this all-around workhorse soft shell. Extremely durable, stretchy and breathable, the 4-way-stretch polyester double weave allows for an excellent fit while resisting wind, water and snow. A chamois lining on the collar, chin guard and wind flap complements the soft, brushed interior for next-to-skin comfort. The regular-coil center-front zipper with DWR (durable water repellent) finish, three external pockets, articulated arms, a drawcord hem and self-fabric cuff tabs round out the details. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

  • "Chamois-lined collar, chin guard, and wind flap"
  • "External pockets: two handwarmers with zipper garages, one left chest - all pocket zippers have a DWR finish"

  • Drawcord hem

description:
Guidewater duffle - large - Whoever said getting there is half the fun obviously wasn't dealing with dripping waders or current airline restrictions. Whether you're traveling by truck, skiff, floatplane or jetliner, the Guidewater makes hauling your gear easier. The coated, floating baffle separates dual zippered wet and dry gear access, so wading boots won't soak your "coming home" shirt. Now made with an even tougher, 840-denier double polyurethane-coated nylon fabric. High-airflow mesh, coated, water-resistant zippers, rod tube attachment points and an adjustable, padded, split shoulder strap, and external zippered mesh pocket combine to create the ultimate angler's duffel. Better yet, it meets most domestic airline carry-on requirements.

Details:
  • "Separate wet and dry sides with floating, water-resistant divider"
  • Coated water-resistant zipper eliminates bulk and provides easy access
  • Two web loops on outside for rod tube attachment
  • Split shoulder strap with adjustable fit
  • External zippered mesh pocket


Fabric: Waterproof side: 840-denier nylon double-coat with polyurethane film. Breathable side: 300-denier polyester (47% recycled) double weave and nylon mesh. Floating divider: 70-denier nylon with polyurethane film

description:
Cap 3 bottoms - The unwavering foundation for any cold-weather clothing system, these bottoms keep you dry, warm and moving forward. They're made from Capilene 3, the most versatile and fastest-wicking of our performance baselayer fabrics: providing excellent insulation and ultimate comfort next to the skin, its dense interior honeycomb grid is brushed for warmth, softness and compressibility. With a smooth jersey exterior that glides readily beneath layers, a brushed, scalloped-edge elastic waistband, a gusseted crotch and a flat-seam construction that eliminates chafe. Made from 4.8-oz 100% polyester (64% recycled) with Gladiodor natural odor control for the garment. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • "The fastest-wicking of our baselayer fabrics, Capilene 3 features a dense interior honeycomb construction"
  • "Fabric next to skin is brushed for warmth, softness and compressibility, while providing excellent insulation and breathability"
  • Smooth jersey exterior glides easily under layers
  • Scalloped-edge elastic waistband is brushed for next-to-skin softness
  • Gusseted crotch for unimpeded mobility


Fabric: 4.8-oz 100% polyester (64% recycled) with Gladiodor natural odor control for the garment. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

description:
Cap 3 crew - Capilene 3, the most versatile and fastest-wicking of our performance baselayer fabrics, helps you stay dry and warm. This crew provides excellent insulation and has a dense interior honeycomb grid that's brushed for warmth, softness and compressibility. Its smooth jersey exterior glides readily beneath layers. Raglan sleeves and single-piece shoulder panels merge out of the way of shoulder straps, and side panels are offset to eliminate chafe. Made from 4.8-oz 100% polyester (64% recycled) with Gladiodor natural odor control for the garment. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

description:
Guidewater shirt - It's a shirt. It's a jacket. It's...shacket? The Guidewater might fit like a traditional canvas fishing shirt, but don't be deceived it repels breeze, bugs, drizzle and spray with soft shell performance. Added bonus: the casual good looks adapt to grocery runs and post-fishing dinners without screaming "I am a fish geek." Made of fast-drying, 4-way stretch nylon with DWR (durable water repellent) finish that provides 50+ UPF sun protection. Self-fabric tabs secure rolled sleeves and the snapdown collar remains unflappable even when running the boat wide open. With hidden daisy chain, snap placket and cuffs and brushed mesh pocket bags. description:
Guidewater waders - king - We built our Guidewater Waders to be the toughest, most puncture-resistant waterproof/breathable wader on the planet. Of course, we couldn't just stop there. Nope. They also had to be extremely lightweight while offering a groundbreaking level of comfort and convenience. In other words, the ultimate wader. We started by strategically placing varying weights of our proprietary waterproof/breathable polyester microfiber fabric package with H2No Hydrostorm barrier according to specific breathablility or toughness needs. The result? Max durability and flexibility without resorting to excessive heavy, sweat-trapping multiple layers. Our revolutionary merino wool grid-lined neoprene booties increase warmth to double that of normal nylon faced neoprene as it wicks perspiration creating guilt-inducing levels of foot comfort. The most advanced version of our innovative internal suspension system allows easy conversion to waist height and - this is critical - quick relief without having to remove your jacket or fight sticky zippers. More features: sculpted upper for reduced drag in heavy currents, anatomically designed left and right legs and booties, built in fabric gravel guards with abrasion-resistant scuff zones and high-filtration mesh drain strip. Field repair kit included.

Details:
  • "Polyester microfiber shell, with a proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish, is highly durable and puncture resistant without excessive multiple layers or added weight; Inside zippered main pocket (with piggyback mesh pocket and internal key/tool loop) flips out for quick access"
  • "Unique, waist-mounted suspender allows easy conversion from chest to waist height, and provides quick relief without having to remove jacket or fight hard-to-operate zippers; TPU post and slot design on front and back of suspenders offers security when wading deep and for roll down, waist high comfort"
  • Anatomically curved knees and modified Y-Joint crotch; inside leg seams are positioned away from wear zones
  • "Specifically designed left and right legs and booties; built-in, heavyweight reinforcement fabric gravel guards with abrasion resistance scuff zones"
  • "Built-in, heavyweight reinforcement fabric gravel guards with abrasion resistance scuff zones and high filtration drain strip; 1 1/4"" gripper elastic gravel guard cuffs"
  • "Concealed stainless steel, locking boot hooks secure cuff to boot and avoid line catch; Stretch Wading Belt with a quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle provides smooth function and an easy adjustable fit"
  • Field repair kit included


Fabric: "Upper: 3-layer, 50-denier twill-woven polyester microfiber shell with a proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Lower torso: 3-layer, 7-oz polyester microfiber reinforcement fabric with proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Seat and legs: 3-layer, 8.2-oz polyester double weave microfiber reinforcement fabric with proprietary H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Gravel guards: 6.35-oz polyester microfiber double weave with Deluge DWR finish, abrasion resistant scuff patches and a high filtration polyester mesh (100% recycled) drainage strip. Booties: merino wool grid-lined 3-mm neoprene with abrasion-resistant fabric soles"

Weight: (1188 g 41.2 oz)

Made in China.

description:
Critical mass - Built for the two-wheeled commute, our Critical Mass overflows with possibilities. Its main compartment is padded on the back and along the contoured base to protect contents and provide structure. A removable padded computer sleeve suspends a 17" or smaller laptop off the ground, and can be paired with the detachable external waist strap to create an independent laptop sling. The cover flap overlaps the sides of the bag to keep out rain; its pocket closes with a water-resistant zipper. External side pockets hold a cell phone, keys and power brick. With an adjustable shoulder strap, a stowable waist strap, a topside carrying handle and a reflective strip for better visibility in low light. description:
Mw hiking crew socks - Mount Mendel's Ice Nine has a long, foot-jarring approach and cold, toe-numbing belays. Count on these versatile hiking socks to keep your feet warm and dry in the full range of conditions. They feature a variable-knit, felted merino wool construction to increase cushion to the heel and toes while banishing excess heat and moisture from the arch; Looped Lintoe construction provides additional comfort. The fabric package combines the natural performance benefits and warmth of 65% merino wool (chlorine-free) with the brawn and wicking properties of 20% nylon/12% polyester/3% spandex. description:
Nano puff p/o - Already a cult classic with our ambassadors and testers, the Nano earns unanimous raves for versatility, surprising warmth and terrific all-around performance in a superlight, no-frills package. It's weather-resistant enough to wear as an insulated shell in a wet snowstorm, trim enough to pull on for chilly rock pitches (and still see your footholds), and warm enough for light belay parka duty on quick alpine dashes. The wind-blocking, moisture-shedding DWR (durable water repellent) finished 100% all-recycled polyester shell (1-oz 15-denier) also glides effortlessly, whether worn as an outer or midlayer. Low-bulk, hydrophobic, highly compressible PrimaLoft One (60 g) traps heat with remarkable efficiency, even when wet. The deep front zipper allows for easy ventilation. The Nano also packs down to practically nothing and stuffs into a single chest pocket that has a carabiner clip-in loop. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Details:
  • Versatile 60-gram PrimaLoft One polyester insulation provides excellent warmth and compressibility
  • Ultralight face fabric sheds water and blocks wind
  • Deep center-front zipper allows for easy ventilation
  • Stuffs into a self-storage left chest pocket
  • Elasticized cuff and hem seal out wind and trap warmth


Fabric: Shell and lining: 1-oz 15-denier 100% all-recycled polyester with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Insulation: 60-g PrimaLoft One polyester. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program

description:
Guidewater waders - reg - We built our Guidewater Waders to be the toughest, most puncture-resistant waterproof/breathable wader on the planet. Of course, we couldn't just stop there. Nope. They also had to be extremely lightweight while offering a groundbreaking level of comfort and convenience. In other words, the ultimate wader. We started by strategically placing varying weights of our proprietary waterproof/breathable polyester microfiber fabric package with H2No Hydrostorm barrier according to specific breathablility or toughness needs. The result? Max durability and flexibility without resorting to excessive heavy, sweat-trapping multiple layers. Our revolutionary merino wool grid-lined neoprene booties wick perspiration and create guilt-inducing levels of foot comfort. The most advanced version of our innovative internal suspension system allows easy conversion to waist height and - this is critical - quick relief without having to remove your jacket or fight sticky zippers. More features: sculpted upper for reduced drag in heavy currents, anatomically designed left and right legs and booties, built in fabric gravel guards with abrasion-resistant scuff zones and high-filtration mesh drain strip. Field repair kit included.

Details:
  • "Polyester microfiber shell, with a proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish, is highly durable and puncture resistant without excessive multiple layers or added weight; Inside zippered main pocket (with piggyback mesh pocket and internal key/tool loop) flips out for quick access"
  • "Unique, waist-mounted suspender allows easy conversion from chest to waist height, and provides quick relief without having to remove jacket or fight hard-to-operate zippers; TPU post and slot design on front and back of suspenders offers security when wading deep and for roll down, waist high comfort"
  • Anatomically curved knees and modified Y-Joint crotch; inside leg seams are positioned away from wear zones
  • "Specifically designed left and right legs and booties; built-in, heavyweight reinforcement fabric gravel guards with abrasion resistance scuff zones"
  • "Built-in, heavyweight reinforcement fabric gravel guards with abrasion resistance scuff zones and high filtration drain strip; 1 1/4"" gripper elastic gravel guard cuffs"
  • "Concealed stainless steel, locking boot hooks secure cuff to boot and avoid line catch; Stretch Wading Belt with a quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle provides smooth function and an easy adjustable fit"
  • Field repair kit included


Fabric: "Upper: 3-layer, 50-denier twill-woven polyester microfiber shell with a proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Lower torso: 3-layer, 7-oz polyester microfiber reinforcement fabric with proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Seat and legs: 3-layer, 8.2-oz polyester double weave microfiber reinforcement fabric with proprietary H2No Hydrostorm barrier and Deluge DWR finish. Gravel guards: 6.35-oz polyester microfiber double weave with Deluge DWR finish, abrasion resistant scuff patches and a high filtration polyester mesh (100% recycled) drainage strip. Booties: merino wool grid-lined 3-mm neoprene with abrasion-resistant fabric soles"

Weight: (1188 g 41.2 oz)

Made in China.

description:
Double haul - Sometimes all you need is a single fly box and clippers, while other times it's all that and the kitchen sink. Fortunately, the Double Haul easily separates into modular components to carry what you need, when you need it. The back pod is large enough to hold an SST and hydration reservoir, and converts to a stand-alone waist or sling pack. The rectangular chest pack, affectionately known as the "Single Haul," organizes fly boxes and other necessities, and can be used separately as a chest or sling pack. Now made from durable polyester (47% recycled) double-weave, the Double Haul also features a stretch waist belt and shoulder strap with quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle for smooth function, low profile and easy adjustment.

  • Durable polyester double-weave chest pack and backpack with modular construction for multiple configurations
  • "Stretch waist belt with adjustable and quick-release DuraFlex Stealth-V buckle for smooth function, low profile and easy adjustment"

  • "Backpack (can be worn alone as waist pack) has stretch mesh pocket for water reservoir, external stretch mesh pocket with 2-way zipper"
  • Brushed stretch shoulder strap for maximum comfort
  • "Stretch-woven nylon back panel provides minimal water absorption, is highly snag-resistant and offers low friction"

Down sweater - There's much to see 14,000 feet up at the Chasm View bivy: a vertigo-inducing panorama of the Diamond and alpenglow over the Rockies. There's also chilly air in any season, and that's where our Down Sweater comes in. It delivers minimal weight, superb compressibility and high-loft warmth. The ripstop shell (1.4-oz 22-denier) with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish does more than look sharp: It's tear-resistant and windproof and made from 100% all-recycled polyester. Silky-soft and livable, it's made with our super-breathable, lightest-weight Capilene performance baselayer fabric, which soothes overcooked skin and also layers well in cooler conditions. Made from 3.7-oz 100% all-recycled polyester, with Gladiodor natural odor control for the garment and 15-UPF sun protection. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.

Flyfishing the athabasca poster - Patrik Ondrus wets his line in the Athabasca River. Jasper National Park, Alberta, Canada. All-time shell - No need to use that morning Times as an umbrella. The All-Times' handsome matte-finish, 100% recycled polyester shell provides tasteful sports-coat-length coverage for the vicissitudes of weather in the city and country. A hardy 2.5-layer, 4.2-oz polyester ripstop with an H2No waterproof/breathable barrier and a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish scoffs at cloudbursts; a 100% polyester (60% recycled) brushed fleece collar lining and chin guard keep you feeling well-kept, and the zip-off hood gives you options and keeps you dry.
